pageTitle: HK3 Gene - GeneCards | HXK3 Protein | HXK3 Antibody
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {57781=Hexokinases phosphorylate glucose to produce glucose-6-phosphate, the first step in most glucose metabolism pathways. This gene encodes hexokinase 3. Similar to hexokinases 1 and 2, this allosteric enzyme is inhibited by its product glucose-6-phosphate. [provided by RefSeq, Apr 2009]}
